text: Harvey Clifford (18 September 1926 - 13 January 1982) was a Canadian alpine skier. He competed in three events at the 1948 Winter Olympics. He was inducted into the Ottawa Sport Hall of Fame. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Canadian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Canada Category:Sportspeople from Manitoba
title: Harvey Clifford
